description:
A powerful spirit known as the `Flame Tengu` has suddenly attacked the Spirit Patrol`s hell hideout - and not even Enma-kun can stand against his flames - he is turning the hideout into a scorching hot oven!
Yukiko-hime just can`t take the heat and calls on the protector of her family, the `Ice Tengu` for help. When he arrives the Flame Tengu and the Ice Tengu start battling it out, but that`s not good for the temperature at all! It keeps getting hot, then cold, then hot again - the Spirit Patrol keep having to switch their clothes to keep with the temperature! The fight between the two Tengu is even having an effect on the human world - Harumi comes by to ask for some help and runs into a bit of trouble herself!
What could possibly have caused the Flame Tengu to attack in the first place!?
Source: Official Site

titles.title: ホッカホカだよ天狗さん
